local_intent: Ensure lid visibility, align to lid_handle, execute Pick with precomputed grasp_lid_top, then verify grasp stability.
assumptions: grasp_lid_top was produced earlier by ComputeGraspPose
coherence_with_global: Respects global flow: perceive (IsObjectVisible/Scan), align (ApproachAndAlign), act (Pick with retries), verify (IsGraspStable). Parameter bins match port_value_spaces.
